title: Moment Macy Storer hears her parents for first time with new hearing aids
text:
A proud father has shared the moment his daughter was able to hear for the first time.

Tristan Storer, from Mollerin, Western Australia, posted a heart-warming video of his daughter Macy having hearing aids installed.

The footage shows the moment the youngster, who was born deaf, heard her parents' voices for the first time in her life.

Tristan Storer, from Mollerin, Western Australia, posted a heart-warming video (pictured) of his daughter Macy having hearing aids installed

When her aids were switched on and sound filled her ears, Macy's face lit up and she reached for her ears in amazement.

Wheat farmer Mr Storer posted the video on Twitter with the caption: 'Today our youngest daughter had the sound 'switched on' for the very first time.

'Can't speak highly enough of the team at hearing Australia who have guided us through this journey over the last month.'

The video went viral online with thousands of views and comments wishing the family well.

Later Mr Storer posted an update on his Twitter account, detailing Macy's progress.

He wrote: 'She was really good yesterday afternoon, had a bath and was actually looking for her new ears while getting dressed afterwards.

'She took a bit of convincing to get them in this morning but once they were in she seemed really happy'.

authors: Charlie Moore For Daily Mail Australia
